snippet: A new Boeing 787 Dreamliner flown by United Airlines was diverted in midflight to New Orleans after it lost speed and altitude over Mississippi with 184 people aboard.
abstract: New Boeing 787 Dreamliner flown by United Airlines headed to Newark from Houston is diverted midflight to New Orleans due to concern over a possible mechanical problem after it lost speed and altitude; United is the first North American carrier to fly the new planes, made of lightweight materials to save fuel, introduced just over a year ago to much fanfare.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER DREW and JAD MOUAWAD

lead_paragraph: A new Boeing 787 Dreamliner flown by United Airlines was diverted in midflight to New Orleans after it lost speed and altitude over Mississippi with 184 people aboard.

headline.main: United 787 Loses Speed and Lands Early
headline.print_headline: United 787 Loses Speed and Lands Early
